content: Method overriding is related to dynamic linking, or runtime binding. In order for the Method Overriding to work, the method call that is going to be called can not be determined at compilation time. It will be decided at runtime, and will be looked up in a table.
stemmed: method overrid relat dynam link , runtim bind . In order method overrid work , method call go call determin compil time . It decid runtim , look tabl .
